Script.EP1: 皆さん おはようございます
Meaning.EP1: Good morning, everyone.

Script.EP1: 速水(はやみ)もこみちです さあ…
Meaning.EP1: This is Mokomichi Hayami.

Script.EP1: 今日は どんなメールが 来てるのでしょうか？
Meaning.EP1: What kind of e-mails are you getting today?

Script.EP1: 女子会かぁ…
Meaning.EP1: A girls' night out...

Script.EP1: 女子会ということで
Meaning.EP1: It's a girls' night out.

Script.EP1: ヘルシーで かわいい 新感覚な
Meaning.EP1: How about a healthy, cute, new sensation?

Script.EP1: 冷製おつまみなんて どうでしょう？
Meaning.EP1: How about a new kind of healthy, cute, cold snack?

Script.EP1: 今日 作りたくなる 簡単レシピを紹介！
Meaning.EP1: I'll show you an easy recipe that you'll want to make today!

Script.EP1: 女の子が喜びそうな この鶏もも これを…
Meaning.EP1: Chicken thighs that the girls will love.

Script.EP1: 鶏もも肉は まず３等分したら
Meaning.EP1: First, cut the chicken thigh into thirds.

Script.EP1: 筋を切り 開いていきます
Meaning.EP1: Cut the sinews out and open it up.

Script.EP1: 焼く前に こういうフォークを 用意します
Meaning.EP1: Before you cook it, you need a fork like this.

Script.EP1: これを…
Meaning.EP1: And we're going to...

Script.EP1: 刺していきます
Meaning.EP1: Stick it in.

Script.EP1: こうすることによって フライパンに 移したときに
Meaning.EP1: This way, when you put it in the pan.

Script.EP1: 火通りが よくなります
Meaning.EP1: So that when you put it in the frying pan, it cooks better.

Script.EP1: ここら辺の周りが
Meaning.EP1: When you see a little white around here.

Script.EP1: ちょっと こう白くなってきたら ひっくり返すタイミングです
Meaning.EP1: When it starts to turn white, it's time to turn it over.

Script.EP1: ほら！
Meaning.EP1: Look!

Script.EP1: いい色！
Meaning.EP1: Nice color.

Script.EP1: 両面が 香ばしく焼けたら
Meaning.EP1: When both sides are fragrant.

Script.EP1: ねぎと しょうがを 加えます
Meaning.EP1: Add the green onion and ginger.

Script.EP1: まさかの梅干し！
Meaning.EP1: Dried plums!

Script.EP1: なんと 梅干しをフライパンへ！
Meaning.EP1: Dried plums in the frying pan.

Script.EP1: そして コンソメスープを 加えます
Meaning.EP1: Add consomme soup.

Script.EP1: ちょっとヒタヒタに なるぐらいまで 入れましょう
Meaning.EP1: Add consomme soup.

Script.EP1: 更に 酒 しょうゆを入れ
Meaning.EP1: Add sake and soy sauce.

Script.EP1: 味を調えたら そこへ落としぶた
Meaning.EP1: Add sake, soy sauce, soy sauce, season to taste, and a drop-lid.

Script.EP1: 落としぶたは アルミホイルで 簡単に作れます
Meaning.EP1: You can use aluminum foil.

Script.EP1: これで 15分から20分 煮詰めましょう
Meaning.EP1: And let it simmer for 15 to 20 minutes.

Script.EP1: 見てください
Meaning.EP1: And look at that.

Script.EP1: 柔らかくなってきました そしたら…
Meaning.EP1: And then... when the chicken is tender.

Script.EP1: 鶏もも肉が 柔らかくなったら
Meaning.EP1: When the chicken thighs are tender.

Script.EP1: バットに取り出し ねぎと しょうがは取り除きます
Meaning.EP1: And when the chicken thighs are tender, we take them out onto a baking pan, and we remove the green onions and the ginger.

Script.EP1: この梅干し これを崩して
Meaning.EP1: And then we take these dried plums and we break them up.

Script.EP1: こういった スプーンなどで ちょっと つぶして…
Meaning.EP1: And crush it a little bit with a spoon, like this.

Script.EP1: これでね タレが できちゃうんです
Meaning.EP1: And then you can make the sauce.

Script.EP1: こんなのも用意します
Meaning.EP1: We also prepare this.

Script.EP1: プチトマト あと きゅうりね
Meaning.EP1: Cherry tomatoes and cucumber.

Script.EP1: きゅうりは 乱切りにします
Meaning.EP1: Cut the cucumber into pieces.

Script.EP1: そして…
Meaning.EP1: And...

Script.EP1: そして 鶏もも肉を 食べやすい大きさに カット
Meaning.EP1: And cut the chicken thighs into bite-size pieces.

Script.EP1: こう ランダムに
Meaning.EP1: Randomly, like this.

Script.EP1: 刺していきましょう
Meaning.EP1: Let's stick it in.

Script.EP1: さあ 見てください
Meaning.EP1: Now, look at this.

Script.EP1: 最後に 梅肉ソースを添えれば出来上がり！
Meaning.EP1: And finally, we'll serve it with plum sauce.

Script.EP1: さあ 今日は これで決まり！
Meaning.EP1: That's it for today!

Script.EP1: 冷やしやきとり風です！
Meaning.EP1: Chilled Yakitori-style!

Script.EP1: 焼かずに煮ることで しっとり 柔らかく仕上げた
Meaning.EP1: Yakitori-style!

Script.EP1: やきとり風の 冷製おつまみ
Meaning.EP1: Yakitori-style cold snacks!

Script.EP1: もこみち君 出来栄えは いかが？
Meaning.EP1: How's it coming, Mr. Mokomichi?

Script.EP1: アア…
Meaning.EP1: Oh...

Script.EP1: この梅肉のタレがいいですね
Meaning.EP1: I love the plum sauce.

Script.EP1: すごく おいしい
Meaning.EP1: It's so good!

Script.EP1: これ 会話も 弾むんじゃないですか？
Meaning.EP1: It's a conversation starter, right?

Script.EP1: ジッピーさん 是非 作ってみてください
Meaning.EP1: Zippy, please try it.

Script.EP1: そして 誘ってください
Meaning.EP1: And please ask her out.

Script.EP1: めぐやんさんからです
Meaning.EP1: It's from Meguyan.

Script.EP1: ありがとうございます
Meaning.EP1: Thank you.

Script.EP1: そしたら 七夕にピッタリな 華やかな そうめんを 作りたいと思います
Meaning.EP1: Then I'll make gorgeous somen noodles, perfect for Tanabata.

Script.EP1: 早速 作っていきましょう
Meaning.EP1: Let's start cooking

Script.EP1: 鍋に 水 しょうゆ
Meaning.EP1: In a pot, add water, soy sauce, mirin, bonito flakes.

Script.EP1: みりん かつお節を加え ひと煮立ちさせます
Meaning.EP1: Add soy sauce, mirin, katsuobushi (dried bonito flakes), and bring to a boil.

Script.EP1: めんつゆの作り方は 水４ しょうゆ１
Meaning.EP1: To make men-tsuyu, you need 4 parts water, 1 part soy sauce, 1 part mirin, 1 part bonito flakes.

Script.EP1: みりん１ かつお節１ですね
Meaning.EP1: Mirin, 1 bonito flakes.

Script.EP1: 覚えといてください
Meaning.EP1: Remember that.

Script.EP1: ボウルに さらしをひいて つゆをこしたら
Meaning.EP1: Put the soy sauce into a bowl and strain the soy sauce.

Script.EP1: ラップをし 冷ましておきましょう
Meaning.EP1: Cover with plastic wrap and let cool.

Script.EP1: そして 溶き卵に塩を加え 薄焼き卵を作ります
Meaning.EP1: Add salt to beaten egg and make thinly fried egg.

Script.EP1: それを３枚重ねて 短冊切りに
Meaning.EP1: Put 3 layers of egg and cut them into strips.

Script.EP1: オクラは塩もみしたら サッと茹で
Meaning.EP1: Boil okra with salt.

Script.EP1: 小口切りにしていきます
Meaning.EP1: Cut it into small pieces.

Script.EP1: にんじんは 型を使って 星形に くりぬきます
Meaning.EP1: Hollow out the carrot into a star shape.

Script.EP1: 鍋の中に 入れていきましょう
Meaning.EP1: Put them in the pot.

Script.EP1: 少し茹でます
Meaning.EP1: Boil it a little.

Script.EP1: さあ そしたら エビ
Meaning.EP1: Now then, the shrimp.

Script.EP1: エビは 竹串で背わたを取り
Meaning.EP1: Remove the back of the shrimp with a bamboo skewer.

Script.EP1: 鍋でサッと茹でたら…
Meaning.EP1: Boil it quickly in the pot, and then...

Script.EP1: このお腹(なか)の部分に ちょっと こう 切り込みを入れます
Meaning.EP1: Then we cut a little slit in the belly.

Script.EP1: こうすることで 美しく 仕上がるのだとか
Meaning.EP1: This is how they make it beautiful.

Script.EP1: そうめん 糸を用意して 結んじゃいます
Meaning.EP1: Prepare the somen threads and tie them together.

Script.EP1: これをですね 茹でましょう
Meaning.EP1: Let's boil it

Script.EP1: 今日 なんで 結んだかというと バラつかせたく なかったからです
Meaning.EP1: The reason why I tied them today is because I didn't want them to fall apart.

Script.EP1: 束の状態で 飾りつけたいので
Meaning.EP1: I wanted to decorate it as a bundle.

Script.EP1: そして いよいよ盛りつけ
Meaning.EP1: And finally, we serve it!

Script.EP1: 刻んだ ねぎ オクラ 卵 みょうが
Meaning.EP1: Chopped green onion, okra, egg, myoga.

Script.EP1: そして 反対側には
Meaning.EP1: And on the other side...

Script.EP1: にんじん エビ 氷を盛りつけます
Meaning.EP1: Carrots, shrimps and ice!

Script.EP1: 今日は これで決まり！
Meaning.EP1: That's it for today!

Script.EP1: 七夕そうめんの 完成です！
Meaning.EP1: Tanabata somen noodles are ready!

Script.EP1: ご覧ください
Meaning.EP1: Please take a look!

Script.EP1: まるで 絵画のように 美しい七夕そうめん
Meaning.EP1: Tanabata somen noodles are as beautiful as a painting.

Script.EP1: もこみち君 出来栄えは いかが？
Meaning.EP1: Mr. Mokomichi, how is it?

Script.EP1: あの… できましたが
Meaning.EP1: Well... it's done.

Script.EP1: どっから 食べたらいいのか 分かりません
Meaning.EP1: But I don't know where to start.

Script.EP1: いただきます
Meaning.EP1: Let's eat.

Script.EP1: ウ～ン…
Meaning.EP1: Mmm...

Script.EP1: でも こういう盛りつけだったら 子供から大人まで楽しめますよね
Meaning.EP1: But with this kind of arrangement, both children and adults can enjoy it.

Script.EP1: めぐやんさんも 是非 試してみてください
Meaning.EP1: You should try it, too.

Script.EP1: モコモコさんからです
Meaning.EP1: This is from Fluff Fluff.

Script.EP1: モコモコっと…
Meaning.EP1: Fluffy...

Script.EP1: 今日は じゃ… 冷やごはんが 大変身する
Meaning.EP1: Today, let's try an idea that will transform cold rice.

Script.EP1: アイデア料理で いきましょうか！
Meaning.EP1: Let's start with an idea.

Script.EP1: 今日はフライパン
Meaning.EP1: Today, a frying pan.

Script.EP1: ここに ごま油
Meaning.EP1: Here, sesame oil.

Script.EP1: 今日は こんな おいしそうな 豚バラを使います
Meaning.EP1: Today we'll use this pork belly.

Script.EP1: これをね 焼きますよ
Meaning.EP1: We're going to cook it.

Script.EP1: 豚バラ肉は 片面に 焼き色がついたら
Meaning.EP1: Brown the pork belly on one side.

Script.EP1: 塩･こしょう にんにくの スライスを加え
Meaning.EP1: Add salt, pepper, and a slice of garlic.

Script.EP1: こんがり焼いていきます
Meaning.EP1: Grill it until golden brown.

Script.EP1: これを焼いてる間に 長ねぎですね
Meaning.EP1: While it's baking, we'll cook the green onions.

Script.EP1: この… 中にある この芯を 取り除きます
Meaning.EP1: We're going to remove the core of the green onion.

Script.EP1: 長ねぎは 芯を取ったら 重ねて千切りに
Meaning.EP1: After removing the core, shred the green onion in layers.

Script.EP1: これを白髪ねぎにしたいんですが こういう さらしを用意します
Meaning.EP1: We want to make shredded leeks, so we'll prepare this kind of sara-sara.

Script.EP1: このねぎを さらしに載せて…
Meaning.EP1: Put these leeks on the sashi...

Script.EP1: てるてる坊主っぽいものを 作るというか…
Meaning.EP1: And make something like a teru teru teru bozu...

Script.EP1: こんな感じでやって…
Meaning.EP1: Like this...

Script.EP1: …で こうして 絞ってあげると
Meaning.EP1: And squeeze them like this.

Script.EP1: きれいに ふやけるんですよ
Meaning.EP1: It will become soft and fluffy.

Script.EP1: オオッ…
Meaning.EP1: Oh, wow...

Script.EP1: そしたら あとは きゅうり
Meaning.EP1: And then, we'll cut the cucumber.

Script.EP1: 千切りします
Meaning.EP1: Cut it into strips

Script.EP1: これを冷水で洗うと…
Meaning.EP1: Wash it in cold water...

Script.EP1: そして 盛りつけ
Meaning.EP1: And serve.

Script.EP1: 今回は 冷麺用の器を使い
Meaning.EP1: This time, use a bowl for cold noodles

Script.EP1: 冷やごはんの上に
Meaning.EP1: On top of the cold rice

Script.EP1: ひと口大に切った豚バラ
Meaning.EP1: Pork belly cut into bite-sized pieces

Script.EP1: きゅうり 白髪ねぎ キムチを載せ…
Meaning.EP1: Cucumber, green onion, kimuchi

Script.EP1: 白ごま 糸とうがらし 韓国のりをトッピング
Meaning.EP1: Topped with white sesame seeds, threads of chili pepper, and Korean seaweed.

Script.EP1: さあ ここで出てくるのが
Meaning.EP1: Now, here's what's served

Script.EP1: 氷と 冷やした ほうじ茶です
Meaning.EP1: Ice and chilled Houjicha tea

Script.EP1: この氷を３つぐらい入れて…
Meaning.EP1: Put about 3 ice cubes in the bowl...

Script.EP1: ほうじ茶をかけて…
Meaning.EP1: Pour some hojicha over it...

Script.EP1: 今日は これで決まり！
Meaning.EP1: That's it for today!

Script.EP1: 冷麺風 冷やし茶漬けの完成です！
Meaning.EP1: Cold noodle style chiyashi chazuke is ready!

Script.EP1: 豚バラと キムチ 韓国のりで
Meaning.EP1: Pork belly, kimchi, Korean seaweed.

Script.EP1: 冷麺風に仕上げた 冷やし茶漬け
Meaning.EP1: Chilled chazuke with cold noodles

Script.EP1: もこみち君 出来栄えは いかが？
Meaning.EP1: How's it coming, Mr. Mokomichi?

Script.EP1: 来た！
Meaning.EP1: Here it comes!

Script.EP1: 今回 ほうじ茶を使ってんですけど ほうじ茶が意外と合うんですよ
Meaning.EP1: I used Houjicha (broiled green tea), but Houjicha goes surprisingly well with this.

Script.EP1: あとは ミネラルウオーターや 煎茶を代わりに使ってもいいです
Meaning.EP1: You can also use mineral water or sencha tea instead

Script.EP1: マシソヨな１品なので 是非 作ってみてください
Meaning.EP1: It's a great dish, so please try it.

Script.EP1: もっちさんからです
Meaning.EP1: It's from Mr. Mocchi.

Script.EP1: そしたら 金メダリスト級の
Meaning.EP1: Then you'll be a gold medalist.

Script.EP1: シーザーサラダを 作ろうかなと思います
Meaning.EP1: I'm thinking of making a Caesar salad.

Script.EP1: まず クルトンを 作りたいんですが
Meaning.EP1: First, I'd like to make croutons.

Script.EP1: こういうバゲットを 用意して…
Meaning.EP1: I'll need a baguette like this.

Script.EP1: バゲットは ３センチほどの厚さで 斜めに切っていきます
Meaning.EP1: Cut the baguette into diagonal slices about 3 cm thick.

Script.EP1: そしたら にんにく 香りを つけるわけなんですよ こうやって すって
Meaning.EP1: Then, we season it with garlic, like this.

Script.EP1: それを オーブントースターへ およそ５分焼きます
Meaning.EP1: And then we're going to put it in the toaster oven for about five minutes.

Script.EP1: さあ そしたら むね肉
Meaning.EP1: And then we're going to open up the meat.

Script.EP1: こいつを 開いてあげましょう
Meaning.EP1: Let's open him up.

Script.EP1: 塩･こしょうを振ったら
Meaning.EP1: We're going to sprinkle some salt and pepper on it.

Script.EP1: オリーブオイルと にんにくで 香りを出した フライパンへ
Meaning.EP1: Then we're going to toss it in a frying pan with some olive oil and garlic.

Script.EP1: 皮目を強火で 揚げるように焼いたら
Meaning.EP1: Now, we're going to fry the skin on high heat.

Script.EP1: 反対側は 弱火で じっくり焼き上げます
Meaning.EP1: The other side, we'll cook it slowly over low heat.

Script.EP1: そしたら
Meaning.EP1: And then...

Script.EP1: チコリをちぎって 入れていきましょう
Meaning.EP1: Then tear up some chicory and put it in.

Script.EP1: 更に 食感がいい ロメインレタスと 薄く切った紫玉ねぎを
Meaning.EP1: Then add some romaine lettuce, which has a nice texture, and some purple onions, cut into thin strips.

Script.EP1: サラダスピナーへ
Meaning.EP1: Into the salad spinner.

Script.EP1: オリーブオイルに フルーティーな 香りを出すための アップルビネガー
Meaning.EP1: Olive oil, apple vinegar for fruity flavor, and mustard.

Script.EP1: そして 粒マスタード
Meaning.EP1: And some mustard.

Script.EP1: 毎朝 食べるんですけど ヨーグルト
Meaning.EP1: I eat it every morning with yogurt.

Script.EP1: 更に パルミジャーノチーズ
Meaning.EP1: And some Parmigiano cheese.

Script.EP1: すりおろした にんにく 塩･こしょうを加え 混ぜ合わせます
Meaning.EP1: Grated garlic, salt and pepper. Toss it all together.

Script.EP1: そのお味は？
Meaning.EP1: How does it taste?

Script.EP1: ウン…
Meaning.EP1: Mmmm...

Script.EP1: でも これだけじゃないんです
Meaning.EP1: But that's not all.

Script.EP1: レモン 皮をすりましょう
Meaning.EP1: Grate the lemon peel.

Script.EP1: 更に レモンをよ～く搾って…
Meaning.EP1: Squeeze the lemon juice...

Script.EP1: ここで 焼き上がった バゲットを取り出して…
Meaning.EP1: Now, take out the baguette...

Script.EP1: もう 手で ちぎっちゃいましょう
Meaning.EP1: Let's take the baguette and tear it by hand.

Script.EP1: ちぎったバゲットは ボウルに入れ
Meaning.EP1: Put the torn baguette in a bowl.

Script.EP1: サラダと合わせ 盛りつけます
Meaning.EP1: Put the torn baguette in a bowl and serve it with the salad.

Script.EP1: そこへ 焼き上がった鶏肉を 載せれば出来上がり！
Meaning.EP1: Then we put the grilled chicken on top and voila!

Script.EP1: 鶏のタンパク質と バゲットの炭水化物で
Meaning.EP1: The protein from the chicken and the carbohydrates from the baguette make this a staple.

Script.EP1: 主食にもなる シーザーサラダ
Meaning.EP1: Caesar Salad is also a staple food!

Script.EP1: もこみち君 出来栄えは いかが？
Meaning.EP1: So, Mr. Mokomichi, how's it coming?

Script.EP1: 意外と あの… チキンを使われてる所が あんまりないと思うんですよ
Meaning.EP1: Surprisingly, I don't think there are many places that use chicken.

Script.EP1: このアイデアが…
Meaning.EP1: This idea...

Script.EP1: ヘルシーかつ ガッツリ食べられる
Meaning.EP1: Healthy and filling!

Script.EP1: 作ってみてください！
Meaning.EP1: Try it!

Script.EP1: 丈太郎君 からでございます
Meaning.EP1: From Jotaro.

Script.EP1: 今日は 夏にピッタリ！ 簡単 麺料理を 作っていきましょう
Meaning.EP1: Perfect for summer! Let's make a simple noodle dish.

Script.EP1: まずは だし汁に みりんと
Meaning.EP1: First, add mirin and soy sauce to the broth.

Script.EP1: しょうゆを足して つゆを作ります
Meaning.EP1: Add soy sauce and mirin to the broth.

Script.EP1: オクラは 塩もみしてから茹で 冷水に さらして色止め
Meaning.EP1: Boil okra with salt and soak in cold water to stop the color.

Script.EP1: 色が鮮やかになりました
Meaning.EP1: The color is now bright.

Script.EP1: 小口切りに
Meaning.EP1: Cut into small pieces.

Script.EP1: そして みょうがと きゅうりは 千切りに
Meaning.EP1: Cut myoga and cucumber into thin strips.

Script.EP1: 切った食材は バットに移しておきます
Meaning.EP1: Put the chopped ingredients into a bowl.

Script.EP1: 今日は ちょっと納豆を 使いたいんですけど
Meaning.EP1: I want to use natto today.

Script.EP1: でも 女の子にモテたい 納豆は ちょっとって いう感じは
Meaning.EP1: But I want to be popular with the girls, so I don't really like natto.

Script.EP1: ありますけど…
Meaning.EP1: But...

Script.EP1: 納豆は みじん切りにした ねぎと しょうゆを加え よく混ぜ合わせます
Meaning.EP1: Mix natto with chopped green onion and soy sauce.

Script.EP1: そしたら 山芋を使います
Meaning.EP1: Then use the yams.

Script.EP1: 刃の反対の部分で 外側の部分を 削り取ります
Meaning.EP1: With the other side of the blade, scrape off the outer part of the yam.

Script.EP1: 山芋も細かく刻み こちらもバットへ
Meaning.EP1: Chop the yams finely and put them in a bowl.

Script.EP1: いよいよ そばを茹でます
Meaning.EP1: Now boil the buckwheat.

Script.EP1: そばの場合は２回 中華麺も２回
Meaning.EP1: Twice for soba, twice for Chinese noodles.

Script.EP1: そして うどんは３回です
Meaning.EP1: For udon noodles, three times.

Script.EP1: 覚えといてください
Meaning.EP1: Remember that.

Script.EP1: そして 茹で上がったら 冷水でしめ
Meaning.EP1: After boiling, put them in cold water.

Script.EP1: 手でクルッと巻いてから お皿へ盛りつけます
Meaning.EP1: Roll it up by hand, and put it on a plate.

Script.EP1: こんな感じになります
Meaning.EP1: It will look like this.

Script.EP1: そこへ オクラ みょうが 山芋 きゅうり
Meaning.EP1: Okra, myoga, yam, cucumber, and finally natto.

Script.EP1: そして 最後に 納豆を添えれば出来上がり！
Meaning.EP1: And finally, natto (natto is a fermented soybean paste).

Script.EP1: 食欲がなくても ツルッといける
Meaning.EP1: Even if you don't have an appetite, you can enjoy it!

Script.EP1: 栄養たっぷりの 冷たいネバそば
Meaning.EP1: Nutritious cold soba noodles!

Script.EP1: もこみち君 出来栄えは いかが？
Meaning.EP1: How is it, Mr. Mokomichi?

Script.EP1: では いただきます
Meaning.EP1: Let's eat!

Script.EP1: このつゆをですね たっぷりかけて 混ぜて食べるんです
Meaning.EP1: Pour a lot of this sauce over the soba and mix it in.

Script.EP1: ネバネバしてたりとか コリコリしてたりシャキシャキとか いろんな食感が楽しめるんで
Meaning.EP1: You can enjoy various textures.

Script.EP1: これは女の子には モテるんじゃないでしょうか
Meaning.EP1: I'm sure it's popular with the girls.

Script.EP1: 12歳 丈太郎君 勉強しましょう
Meaning.EP1: Jotaro, 12 years old. Let's study.

Script.EP1: ぱこちゃんからです
Meaning.EP1: This is from Paco-chan.

Script.EP1: ありがとうございます
Meaning.EP1: Thank you.

Script.EP1: まあ でも そしたら そのフレッシュな トマトを使った…
Meaning.EP1: But then... using fresh tomatoes...

Script.EP1: え～ 今日は そうですね
Meaning.EP1: Well... today, yes.

Script.EP1: ちょっと オシャレなパスタ これで いきましょうか
Meaning.EP1: Shall we go with a fancy pasta dish?

Script.EP1: トマトは まず 包丁で へたを取ったら
Meaning.EP1: First, remove the stems with a knife.

Script.EP1: 表面に軽く 切れ目を入れ
Meaning.EP1: Cut a slit on the surface.

Script.EP1: それを熱湯の中へ
Meaning.EP1: Put them in boiling water.

Script.EP1: 熱湯に入れます
Meaning.EP1: Put it in boiling water.

Script.EP1: もう ちょっと 入れるだけでいいです
Meaning.EP1: Just a little bit more.

Script.EP1: サッと茹でたら トマトを 氷水にさらし
Meaning.EP1: After a quick boil, put the tomatoes in ice water.

Script.EP1: 切れ目から皮をむきます
Meaning.EP1: Then peel the skin from the slit.

Script.EP1: こいつを…
Meaning.EP1: Here...

Script.EP1: 皮をむいたトマトは クシ形にカット
Meaning.EP1: Cut the peeled tomatoes into wedges.

Script.EP1: ボウルへ移します
Meaning.EP1: Put them in a bowl.

Script.EP1: そこへ ブラックオリーブに マイクロトマト
Meaning.EP1: Then we add the black olives and the micro-tomatoes.

Script.EP1: 彩りが 豊かになってきました
Meaning.EP1: Now we have a lot of color.

Script.EP1: 今度はドレッシング作り
Meaning.EP1: Now we make the dressing.

Script.EP1: にんにくと 数種類のハーブに
Meaning.EP1: Garlic and a few herbs.

Script.EP1: 塩･こしょうをして すり
Meaning.EP1: Salt and pepper.

Script.EP1: オリーブオイル
Meaning.EP1: Olive oil and wine vinegar.

Script.EP1: ワインビネガーなどを 加え よく混ぜます
Meaning.EP1: Olive oil, wine vinegar, etc., and mix well.

Script.EP1: お味は いかが？
Meaning.EP1: How does it taste?

Script.EP1: 出来上がった ドレッシングは
Meaning.EP1: The dressing is then poured over the tomatoes.

Script.EP1: トマトにかけ よく和(あ)えます
Meaning.EP1: Pour over the tomatoes and mix well.

Script.EP1: …で ラップをし
Meaning.EP1: Wrap it in plastic wrap.

Script.EP1: これを冷蔵庫で少し
Meaning.EP1: Put it in the refrigerator.

Script.EP1: 味がなじむように 冷やします
Meaning.EP1: Let it cool for a little while so that the flavors can blend.

Script.EP1: さあ 入れます
Meaning.EP1: And now we put it in.

Script.EP1: 今日のパスタ 茹で時間は９分
Meaning.EP1: Pasta is cooked for 9 minutes.

Script.EP1: さあ パスタのほうは もういい感じなので…
Meaning.EP1: Now, the pasta is ready to go, so...

Script.EP1: 茹で上がったら いよいよ仕上げ！
Meaning.EP1: When it's done, it's time to finish it!

Script.EP1: まず 冷蔵庫から ドレッシングで和えたトマトを 取り出します
Meaning.EP1: First, take out the tomatoes with the dressing from the fridge.

Script.EP1: もういい感じですね
Meaning.EP1: They're already looking good.

Script.EP1: そこへ パルミジャーノチーズを 振りかけ
Meaning.EP1: Then, sprinkle some Parmigiano cheese on top.

Script.EP1: 茹で上がったパスタを ボウルへ
Meaning.EP1: And then we put the cooked pasta in a bowl.

Script.EP1: トマト ドレッシングと からめていきます
Meaning.EP1: We're going to toss the pasta with the tomato dressing.

Script.EP1: あとは盛りつけ
Meaning.EP1: And then we're ready to serve.

Script.EP1: まず チコリを お皿に敷き
Meaning.EP1: First, you put the chicory on a plate.

Script.EP1: その上に からめた パスタを載せます
Meaning.EP1: Then you put the pasta on top of the chicory.

Script.EP1: ここがね 大事なんですよ
Meaning.EP1: This is the important part.

Script.EP1: まあ でも ちょっと…
Meaning.EP1: Well, it's a little bit...

Script.EP1: 更に カッテージチーズを 振りかけ…
Meaning.EP1: Sprinkle some cottage cheese on top...

Script.EP1: こしょうを皿の周りに かければ 今日は これで決まり！
Meaning.EP1: Sprinkle some pepper around the plate, and that's it for today!

Script.EP1: 冷製トマトパスタの 完成です！
Meaning.EP1: Cold tomato pasta is ready!

Script.EP1: バジルの香りと
Meaning.EP1: The aroma of basil and

Script.EP1: 冷たいトマトが 食欲をそそる 冷製パスタ
Meaning.EP1: The aroma of basil and the cold tomatoes make this cold pasta very appetizing.

Script.EP1: もこみち君 出来栄えは いかが？
Meaning.EP1: How's it coming, Mr. Mokomichi?

Script.EP1: おいしい
Meaning.EP1: Delicious!

Script.EP1: こういったフレッシュな トマトを使って こういうふうに冷製パスタを 作ってもいいと思います
Meaning.EP1: You can also use fresh tomatoes to make chilled pasta like this.

Script.EP1: こんな１品もあります 是非 チャレンジしてみてください
Meaning.EP1: There is another dish like this. Please give it a try.

Script.EP1: バブーさんからです
Meaning.EP1: It's from Babu.

Script.EP1: ありがとうございます
Meaning.EP1: Thank you very much.

Script.EP1: 今日は また ちょっと違った え～ 新しいですね
Meaning.EP1: Today's dish is a little different. It's new.

Script.EP1: マンネリ解消 新感覚サラダを 作ろうと思います
Meaning.EP1: I'm going to make a new kind of salad.

Script.EP1: 早速 作っていきましょう
Meaning.EP1: Let's get started.

Script.EP1: 今日は こんなステキな 食材を用意しました
Meaning.EP1: Today, I've prepared these wonderful ingredients.

Script.EP1: まず この ルッコラなんですけど…
Meaning.EP1: First, this arugula...

Script.EP1: この端の部分を ちぎって…
Meaning.EP1: I'm going to tear off the ends of the arugula.

Script.EP1: これをボウルへ 入れてしまいます
Meaning.EP1: I'm going to put it in a bowl.

Script.EP1: そして グリーンオリーブ
Meaning.EP1: And green olives.

Script.EP1: もう あらかじめ カットしてあるものです
Meaning.EP1: They're pre-cut.

Script.EP1: これを入れます
Meaning.EP1: And then we put these in.

Script.EP1: そして このラズベリー
Meaning.EP1: And these raspberries.

Script.EP1: これも丸ごと 入れちゃいましょう
Meaning.EP1: We're gonna put these in whole.

Script.EP1: …で ここにですね
Meaning.EP1: And here... and here...

Script.EP1: ちょっと このオリーブオイル かけて…
Meaning.EP1: We'll put a little bit of olive oil on this...

Script.EP1: からめていきましょう
Meaning.EP1: Let's mix it in.

Script.EP1: こいつを 使いたいと思います
Meaning.EP1: I'm going to use this.

Script.EP1: ここにラズベリーを たくさん乳鉢に入れて
Meaning.EP1: We're going to put a lot of raspberries in a mortar and pestle.

Script.EP1: つぶしていきましょう
Meaning.EP1: Let's mash them.

Script.EP1: ここに 塩 そして こしょう
Meaning.EP1: Here's some salt and pepper.

Script.EP1: そしたら あの… このレモン
Meaning.EP1: And then, um... this lemon.

Script.EP1: 半分にカットして 搾ります
Meaning.EP1: Cut it in half and squeeze it.

Script.EP1: ザーッと…
Meaning.EP1: Squeeze it.

Script.EP1: 更に そこへ オリーブオイルと ヨーグルトを加えて
Meaning.EP1: Then add the olive oil and the yogurt.

Script.EP1: よく混ぜ合わせます
Meaning.EP1: Mix it all together.

Script.EP1: なるほど これを ドレッシングにするのね
Meaning.EP1: I see. So this is what you use for dressing.

Script.EP1: すごく おいしい
Meaning.EP1: It's so good.

Script.EP1: ここに このレモンの皮を 削っていきましょう
Meaning.EP1: Let's shave this lemon peel here.

Script.EP1: こんなドレッシング なかなかないですよね
Meaning.EP1: Dressings like this don't come along very often.

Script.EP1: そしたら もう 盛りつけに入ります
Meaning.EP1: Then we can start serving.

Script.EP1: 早いですよ 今日は
Meaning.EP1: It's early today.

Script.EP1: まず お皿に野菜を盛りつけ…
Meaning.EP1: First, put the vegetables on a plate...

Script.EP1: その上にドレッシングを 回しがけします
Meaning.EP1: Then, we'll pour the dressing over the vegetables.

Script.EP1: そして 最後に チーズを削れば
Meaning.EP1: And finally, some cheese shavings.

Script.EP1: 今日は これで決まり！
Meaning.EP1: That's it for today!

Script.EP1: 鮮やかな ピンクが まぶしい
Meaning.EP1: It's a bright pink.

Script.EP1: 見た目も味も 正に新感覚の
Meaning.EP1: It looks and tastes like nothing you've ever tasted before.

Script.EP1: ラズベリーと ヨーグルトのサラダ
Meaning.EP1: Raspberry and yogurt salad.

Script.EP1: もこみち君 出来栄えは いかが？
Meaning.EP1: How's it coming, Mr. Mokomichi?

Script.EP1: なんかね…
Meaning.EP1: I don't know...

Script.EP1: まあ サラダなんだけど スイーツっていうか…
Meaning.EP1: Well, it's a salad, but it's more like a sweet.

Script.EP1: 代わりに ブルーベリーでも いいですし イチゴなんかも 使ってもいいと思います
Meaning.EP1: You could use blueberries instead, or strawberries

Script.EP1: こんな新感覚サラダも ありますんで
Meaning.EP1: I have a new kind of salad.

Script.EP1: 是非 作ってみてください
Meaning.EP1: Please try it!
